summary: Iteration 46 - Student Admission Form Enhancement Testing. All 8 tabs verified (Basic Info, ID & Docs, Family, Contact, Bank, Transport, Medical, Education). Backend API tested with 50+ extended fields. Fixed StudentResponse model to include all new fields for proper data retrieval.
critical_code_review_comments: StudentResponse model was missing 40+ extended fields - FIXED by adding all new fields
Data was being saved correctly to MongoDB but not returned in API response - FIXED
All 8 tabs in admission form are working correctly with proper field organization
Form submission creates student with auto-generated Student ID (STU-YYYY-NNNNN format)
Parent account auto-created when mobile number provided
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Added extended fields to StudentResponse model (lines 427-490)

success_rate.backend: 100% (API tests passed, all fields saved and retrieved correctly)

seed_data_creation: Created test students: Test Student Extended 31346, Minimal Test Student
context_for_next_testing_agent: Student Admission Form enhancement complete. 8 tabs: Basic Info (Name, Class, Gender, DOB, Admission Date, Blood Group, Birth Place, Identification Mark), ID & Docs (Scholar No, PEN, Aadhar, Samagra ID, Samagra Family ID, Jan Aadhar, Caste, Religion, Category, Mother Tongue, RTE), Family (Father/Mother/Guardian details with Occupation, Qualification, Annual Income), Contact (Mobile, Secondary Phone, Email, Address, Emergency contacts), Bank (Bank Name, Account No, IFSC, Branch), Transport (Mode, Bus Route, Bus Stop, Hostel checkbox), Medical (Conditions, Allergies), Education (Previous School, Class, Percentage, TC Number). Backend StudentCreate model has 50+ fields, all saved to MongoDB correctly.

form_submission.details: Student created with auto-generated ID, credentials dialog shown

data_persistence.details: All 50+ fields saved to MongoDB and returned in API response

bug_fix_applied.fix: Added 40+ optional fields to StudentResponse model to match StudentCreate model
